item.title: Interactive Tableau Dashboard for Real Estate Data Visualization
item.description: A custom GitHub Action to publish Obsidian notes as a website

item.title: Real-time Data Streaming Pipeline with Apache Stack
item.description: Built an end-to-end data engineering pipeline using Apache Airflow, Kafka, Spark, and Cassandra for efficient data streaming and management.

item.title: Sales Insight Dashboard with PowerBI
item.description: PowerBI dashboard built for AtliQ hardware, providing insights on sales trends, revenue performance, and market analysis.

item.title: YouTube Data Analysis
item.description: Analyzed YouTube trends using AWS services like S3, Glue, and QuickSight to derive insights on video popularity across different regions.
